wytr.item.misc.AbilityShard.desc:
Use this to reset your
§fAbility Tree §7while in a town.
wytr.item.misc.AbilityShard.desc.using:
A shard is already
present on this socket
wytr.item.misc.elementPowder.uses:
Add this powder to your items
by visiting a Powder Master
or use it as an ingredient
when crafting.
wytr.item.misc.elementPowder.special:
Adding 2 powders of tier 4-6
at the powder master will
unlock a special attack/effect.
wytr.item.misc.blankPowder.desc:
Use this item at the
§fPowder Exchange §7to get a
free §6T%s§6 Powder §7of your choice
wytr.item.misc.healPotion.desc:
Drinking this potion will
regenerate your health over
%s seconds.
wytr.item.misc.manaPotion.desc:
Drinking this potion will
regenerate your mana over
%s seconds.
wytr.item.misc.statPotion.desc:
Drinking this potion will
boost your %1$s by
%2$s and boost your %3$s by %4$s for %5$s seconds
wytr.item.misc.expPotion.desc:
Drinking this potion will
boost your %1$s by %2$s
for %3$s seconds.
wytr.item.misc.teleportationScroll.desc2:
Teleportation scrolls can be used
for quick travelling across the world
wytr.item.misc.brokenDungeonKey.desc:
Use this item at the
§fForgery§7 to craft a
%s§4 Key
wytr.item.misc.dungeonReward.desc:
Exchange this for items
at the §fDungeon Shop
wytr.item.misc.Rune.desc:
Use this item to enter §fRaids
§7or craft a §fCorrupted Dungeon Key
